mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER_NOTICE(noticeTitle, noticeNickname, noticeContent, noticeWritedate) VALUES(#{noticeTitle}, #{noticeNickname}, #{noticeContent}, curdate());
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER_NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICENUM DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER_NOTICE SET noticeTitle=#{noticeTitle}, noticeContent=#{noticeContent} WHERE noticeNum=#{noticeNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER_INFO(infoTel, infoName, infoNickname, infoAge, infoSex, infoRecommend, infoLastguild, infoWritedate) VALUES(#{infoTel}, #{infoName}, #{infoNickname}, #{infoAge}, #{infoSex}, #{infoRecommend}, #{infoLastguild}, now());
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER_INFO ORDER BY INFONUM DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER_INFO SET infoNickname=#{infoNickname}, infoAge=#{infoAge}, infoSex=#{infoSex}, infoTel=#{infoTel}, infoRecommend=#{infoRecommend}, infoLastguild=#{infoLastguild} WHERE infoNum=#{infoNum}
